## normal dist with 0 mean parametric

```{r}
# normal distribution
mean0norm <- function (sd){
  function(N){
    rnorm(N, mean=0, sd=sd)
  }
}

results = param.monster(true_dist=mean0norm, true_theta=1, params_estimator=function(x) sd(x), n=100, N=1000, M=300)
hist(results, xlab="estimated variance")
print(list(sd.of.estimated.variance=sd(results)))
```


## normal dist with unknown mean parametric

```{r}


normdist <- function (x){
  function(N){
    rnorm(N, mean=x$mean, sd=x$sd)
  }
}

full_estimator <- function(x) list(mean=mean(x), sd=sd(x))
estimator <- function(x) sd(x)

results = param.monster(true_distr=normdist, true_theta=list(mean=0, sd=1), params_estimator=full_estimator, estimator=estimator, n=100, N=1000, M=300)
hist(results, xlab="estimated variance")
print(list(sd.of.estimated.variance=sd(results)))
```
